Load libraries
```{r setup, message=FALSE}

#### Load packages ####
library(camprotR)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(MSnbase)
```

```{r}
psm_res <- readRDS('../results/psm_res.rds')
```

```{r}
psm_res %>% names() %>% lapply(function(x){
  p1 <- plot_TMT_notch(psm_res[[x]]) + ggtitle(x)
  p2 <- plot_TMT_notch(psm_res[[x]], facet_by_sample=TRUE) + ggtitle(x)
  print(p1)
  print(p2)
  return(NULL)
})
```
